message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $10000. It's a great deal for you, as it's worth $12000 to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $8500 is a little too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit further, how about $9250?  This would still be a great deal for you, considering the product's value to you. Let's see if we can find some common ground.

I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $9250 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $8000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my expenses.
